comments:
Using build I20070418-1012.

I had opened a compare editor on a Java file in Synchronize perspective and decide to release the change I did on it. Just after the file was released, the editor closed as expected but I got error dialog signaling that a NPE occured!

Here's the stack trace I got from error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.compare.CompareEditorInput.runAsynchronously(CompareEditorInput.java:1100)
at org.eclipse.compare.structuremergeviewer.StructureDiffViewer.compareInputChanged(StructureDiffViewer.java:348)
at org.eclipse.compare.structuremergeviewer.StructureDiffViewer$2.run(StructureDiffViewer.java:72)
at org.eclipse.compare.internal.Worker.performNextTask(Worker.java:116)
at org.eclipse.compare.internal.Worker.run(Worker.java:63)
at org.eclipse.compare.internal.WorkerJob.run(WorkerJob.java:30)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 183011 ***
